text: once you grow up you expected to have it
together but that can be hard sometimes
when life gets too overwhelming and
scary here's a video to bring you
comfort this meditative video is for you
to have and come back to whenever you
need it when everything is going wrong
and it feels like the world is punishing
you know that it's not your fault you
are deserving of happiness and for good
things to happen to you you are enough
and you've always been enough there's
nothing more you could have done to keep
them in your life one day you will be
loved exactly as you are Mr Rogers once
said if you could only sense how
important you are to the lives of those
you meet how important you can be to the
people you may never even dream of there
is something of yourself that you leave
at every meeting with another person one
day you will find your people and they
will love you for you you were born for
a reason and you belong here the London
Natural History Museum tells us that
elements in your body were formed in
Stars over the course of billions of
years and multiple star lifetimes in
your search for something greater
something better don't forget that you
already have a little bit of Stardust
inside of you there's something
comforting about the fact that nothing
lasts forever like this pain is
temporary but some moments are so
special you wish they could last forever
like laying on your back and looking up
at the stars losing yourself in the
constellations or 2 a.m. conversations
when you feel like someone just gets it
or even simpler things like realizing
you have more time to sleep before your
alarm goes off but the best moments they
haven't happened yet your best day is
still to
come it can be terrifying
to open yourself up to hope to believe
that it gets
better but hope is all around us random
acts of kindness happen all the time
acts of humanity and selflessness exist
and there are millions of kind people in
the
world sometimes when the world is cruel
we can forget about the good that exists
even something bigger than us like Earth
healing is possible in fact the UN just
reported that the ozone layer which is
vital to protecting life on Earth is on
track to be restored to full strength
within decades when something like the
ozone layer can be restored it makes you
think about what else can be there is
something comforting about the idea of
rebirth like you don't have to be tied
to the person you were before why should
you be tied to the person you were
before when your cells aren't 330
billion of your cells are replaced tast
daily in 80 to 100 days 30 trillion of
your cells will replenish these new
cells could be equivalent to a new you
meaning you aren't the same person you
were 5 years ago you have a lot to be
proud of you've overcome a lot looking
back you've actually come a really long
way but it's okay to go back in time and
visit memories just don't get stuck
there and it's only natural to want to
know what the future holds so the next
time you want a time travel just
remember what author Matt hag said how
to stop time kiss how to travel in time
read how to escape time music how to
feel time right how to release
time breathe when's the last time you
took a moment to just
breathe it can be easier to comfort
others than to remember to comfort
yourself clinical psychologist Jaclyn
Johnson shares that it's normal to not
know how to comfort yourself or even to
feel guilty for focusing on yourself for
once but self-comfort is critical for
our emotional well-being here are some
more small ways to practice self-comfort
on your own practice self-compassion
allowing yourself to acknowledge and
release your emotions or decorating your
space with colors or items that are are
soothing to you we want to know what
brings you comfort please share
something comforting in the comments for
a stranger to read as always thank you
for being here and we'll see you real
soon you matter to us
